title: Alain Robbe-Grillet - 4 novels
description:
ALAIN ROBBE-GRILLET (1922 - 2008) was a French writer and filmmaker.  Along with Nathalie Sarraute, Michel Butor and Claude Simon, he was one of the figures most associated with the Nouveau Roman (new novel) trend.


The following books are in EPUB format:

* THE ERASERS (Grove Press, 1964).  Translated by Richard Howard.

* JEALOUSY & IN THE LABYRINTH (Grove Press, 1965).  Translated by Richard Howard.

* THE VOYEUR (Grove Press, 1958).  Translated by Richard Howard.
